General.Name: Shanghai Hajime Advanced Material Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shanghai Hajime Advanced Material Technology Co., Ltd. develops engineering plastics precision parts and molds for passenger, commercial, and new energy vehicles; high-end kitchen and bathroom appliances; and other applications. It offers automotive airbag components, engine knock sensors, thermal management modules, plastic tensioner parts, electronic water pumps and valve parts, carbon canister solenoid valves, thermostat parts, window seal parts, carbon canister solenoid valve parts, actuator parts, electronic water pump parts - PPS impellers, split impellers, solenoid valve parts, electronic water pump housings and integrated impellers, water pump stator assemblies, and battery cooling system - sealing plates, as well as plumbing, engine resonant cavity, and PPS thermal management module components. It also provides new energy vehicle plastic tensioners, capacitor components; gas water heater PPS water control 3 bodies, PPS water flow sensor assemblies, PPS water flow regulating valves, PPS pressure relief valves, rotor impellers, valve bodies, PPS water valve housings, and PPS flow sensor bodies; electric water heater electronic anode parts and PPS inlet and outlet water connectors; new energy vehicle electronic water pump - winding skeletons, engine shock absorber components, water plug mixing valves, quick car connectors, car trunk buttons, and instant heating components. In addition, it offers commercial vehicle filtration system components, smart warm water toilet solenoid valve PPS valve bodies; intelligent warm water toilet deodorization components, smart warm water toilet heater components, flow meters, buffer tanks, and nozzle assemblies; water purifier faucet main bodies, water purifier faucet bases, and intelligent warm water toilet baffles; pump guide plates discs, water pump impellers, electromagnet parts, and solenoid valve parts; and router, projector, and camera parts. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
